io.blocko.coinstack

Class ECDSA

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.blocko.coinstack.ECDSA

  • public class ECDSA
extends Object
    ECDSA algorithm implementation. Signing message with private key verify signature with Bitcoin address which is derived from ECDSA public key.
    Here is an example usage. 
    
  String originalMsg = "Hello World";
  String signedMsg = ECDSA.signMessage("KzHkJd3benUqL9nWhjU2bRGQpz9Vk1V4ts2ytGHZkuqfMmfRWNsh", originalMsg);
  boolean isValidMsg = ECDSA.verifyMessageSignature("1GFXaxB5tYZ9F84X29pmQboGj4PupnbvmH", originalMsg, signedMsg);
 
  System.out.println(signedMsg);
  System.out.println(isValidMsg);
    A result is 
    
  H7ErKzJ9w3YahZCO1iUMlU1MlekJEPDaySCp8A5VItowGvXgbhG8Fpjm8AGrpN4CVB4MgRhUO+gyaKWgUpWusWk=
  true

      Sign message text with private key, producing signature Signature will be verified later with verifyMessageSignature method This method is used for either Mainnet or Testnet

    • Method Detail

      • signMessage

        public static String signMessage(String privateKeyWIF,
                                 String messageText)
                          throws MalformedInputException
        Sign message text with private key, producing signature Signature will be verified later with verifyMessageSignature method This method is only used for Mainnet
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - ECDSA private key with WIF form which is originally generated from ECKey class
        messageText - Text message that will be signed with private key
        Returns:
        Signature generated, it will be verified with verifyMessageSignature method
        Throws:
        MalformedInputException - Invalid private key

      • signMessage

        public static String signMessage(String privateKeyWIF,
                                 String messageText,
                                 boolean isMainNet)
                          throws MalformedInputException
        Sign message text with private key, producing signature Signature will be verified later with verifyMessageSignature method This method is used for either Mainnet or Testnet
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - ECDSA private key with WIF form which is originally generated from ECKey class
        messageText - Text message that will be signed with private key
        isMainNet - True is Mainnet, false is Testnet
        Returns:
        Signature generated, it will be verified with verifyMessageSignature method
        Throws:
        MalformedInputException - Invalid private key

      • verifyMessageSignature

        public static boolean verifyMessageSignature(String address,
                                             String messageText,
                                             String signature)
        verify signature which is originally generated by signMessage method with Bitcoin address and original message This method is only used for Mainnet
        Parameters:
        address - Bitcoin address derived from ECDSA public key
        messageText - Text message that was signed with private key
        signature - Signature generated by signMessage method
        Returns:
        boolean

      • verifyMessageSignature

        public static boolean verifyMessageSignature(String address,
                                             String messageText,
                                             String signature,
                                             boolean isMainNet)
        verify signature which is originally generated by signMessage method with Bitcoin address and original message This method is used for either Mainnet or Testnet
        Parameters:
        address - Bitcoin address derived from ECDSA public key
        messageText - Text message that was signed with private key
        signature - Signature generated by signMessage method
        isMainNet - Whether the message is signed using mainnet option or not
        Returns:
        boolean
